content: Is there a general reference for all of the different <backslash><string> codes that can be used to produce unicode characters? I'm sure this is well-documented somewhere, but it seems like I don't know the right keywords to search here

In general you can hover over unicode chars in a Lean file to get the backslash incantation to type it. Other than that the ultimate reference is: https://github.com/leanprover/vscode-lean4/blob/master/lean4-unicode-input/src/abbreviations.json
Daniel Geisz has marked this topic as resolved.
